body_html:
Thanks so much for your help @petewarden.

This got me a lot further through the build process but ran into a new error at the end :

  1. Did sudo apt-get update and dist-upgrade as usual to ensure have I the latest system.
  2. pi@raspberrypi:~ $ sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool curl make g++ unzip
  3. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo ./autogen.sh
  4. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo ./configure
  5. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo make
  6. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo make install
  7. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ cd ../../../../..
  8. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow $ make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize"
    PROTOC = "protoc"
    CC_PREFIX = ""
    protoc tensorflow/core/util/test_log.proto --cpp_out /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/
    protoc: error while loading shared libraries: libprotobuf.so.10: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
    tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile:411: recipe for target '/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/tensorflow/core/util/test_log.pb.cc' failed
    make: *** [/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/tensorflow/core/util/test_log.pb.cc] Error 127
body_text:
Thanks so much for your help @petewarden.
This got me a lot further through the build process but ran into a new error at the end :

Did sudo apt-get update and dist-upgrade as usual to ensure have I the latest system.
pi@raspberrypi:~ $ sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool curl make g++ unzip
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo ./autogen.sh
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo ./configure
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo make
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo make install
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ cd ../../../../..
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow $ make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize"
PROTOC = "protoc"
CC_PREFIX = ""
protoc  tensorflow/core/util/test_log.proto --cpp_out /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/
protoc: error while loading shared libraries: libprotobuf.so.10: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile:411: recipe for target '/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/tensorflow/core/util/test_log.pb.cc' failed
make: *** [/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/tensorflow/core/util/test_log.pb.cc] Error 127
body:
Thanks so much for your help @petewarden. 

This got me a lot further through the build process but ran into a new error at the end :
1. Did sudo apt-get update and dist-upgrade as usual to ensure have I the latest system.
2. pi@raspberrypi:~ $ sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool curl make g++ unzip
3. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo ./autogen.sh
4. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo ./configure
5. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo make
6. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ sudo make install
7. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf $ cd ../../../../..
8. pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow $ make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize"
   PROTOC = "protoc"
   CC_PREFIX = ""
   protoc  tensorflow/core/util/test_log.proto --cpp_out /home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/
   protoc: error while loading shared libraries: libprotobuf.so.10: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile:411: recipe for target '/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/tensorflow/core/util/test_log.pb.cc' failed
   make: **\* [/home/pi/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/tensorflow/core/util/test_log.pb.cc] Error 127
